EmailTemplate.subject: A message from Gregg Cohen, President of BendixKing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear valued customers and partners:
On behalf of the entire BendixKing team, I’m writing to let you know that we remain committed to supporting you and your customers.
We recognize that general aviation is even more essential now and we will continue to do what’s necessary to ensure you have the product, support and information you need during this time.
For more information on how Honeywell is responding to COVID-19, please visit the the Honeywell website <[[https://www.honeywell.com/en-us/coronavirus]]> on this matter. We will continue to share product announcements, details and training to keep you informed as they become available.
Please reach out to your sales manager {{lead.ASM Name and Email}} for more information or support.
Of course, first and foremost, please take care of yourself and your family.
Gregg Cohen
President BendixKing
